rows.label: qst710901_msg0001
rows.name:
War with the Shiyans...
Raids by Metsu...
I hope Superbia can make it through.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0002
rows.name:
But... I worry what would happen if we
couldn't maintain our strength. We're
supposed to be His Majesty's vanguard.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0003
rows.name:
In the face of this kind of threat, we
ought to be looking for some fresh
energy to bolster our defense.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0004
rows.name:
H-huh...?
Where did you guys spring from?

rows.label: qst710901_msg0005
rows.name:
What? Why do we need to bolster our
defense, you say?

rows.label: qst710901_msg0006
rows.name:
Surely that's obvious. One only has
two choices in life. Success through
strength, or weeping in weakness.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, that's in the world the way
it is right now, at least...

rows.label: qst710901_msg0008
rows.name:
So, if there's something I can do to
make His Majesty a little stronger...

rows.label: qst710901_msg0009
rows.name:
What I mean to say is... I want to be a
strong and effective soldier. For the
good of my homeland!

rows.label: qst710901_msg0010
rows.name:
And even if we're up against an
opponent like Metsu...I still want to do
what I can.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0011
rows.name:
That's right! I could probably learn a
thing or two from you guys. You look
like you can handle yourselves.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0012
rows.name:
Maybe you'll do me the honor of
giving me a bout?

rows.label: qst710901_msg0013
rows.name:
But don't hold back! No need to
sugar-coat it! Just come at me like
it's the real thing!

rows.label: qst710901_msg0014
rows.name:
That's the sort of mindset that we'll
need if we're going to have a hope of
standing up to Grail.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm known as the best shot in the
whole of the Imperial Army.
Underestimate me at your peril!
